title: Ep. 592 - Your Life Does Not Depend On The President
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, many people in this country seem to think that if the result of the presidential election is not what they want it to be, it will be the end of life as they know it. This is why cities have to brace for rioting if Trump wins. People are way too emotionally invested in presidential politics. Today I’ll try to inject a little bit of sanity into this picture. Also Five Headlines including Trump picking up another endorsement from a prominent rapper. Is this an aberration or is it a sign that Trump will do better than the polls predict? Also your Daily Cancellation and much more.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
